contents.item: If we focus on ourselves alone, we run our nation down.
Stay focused! Know where you are heading towards in life with your life! People going somewhere don't just go anywhere!
Focus on the objective, execute the process to get there.
contents.owner: Edwin Dearborn, Power Branding Secrets: Spark Customer Interest and Ignite Your Sales

contents.item: I came to understand that in life: some make it happen, some watch it happen and some say, "What happened?". The beauty is, as long as you are alive you can choose in which category you want to belong
Focus is a weapon as much as much as your bow.
I feel a sudden clear focus and perspective. There is no time for anything inessential. I must focus on myself, my work, and my friends.
Don't let someone feel like they are following you and don't let yourself feel like you are following someone.
Focus on what you like and forget about what you don't like, before it drains all your energy.Full equipment on the hands of an empty mind is useless, I prefer a full mind with empty hands.
I love libraries. Everybody there is serious and focused even if they are not absorbing or learning anything better
Fashion is a distraction!
There is no labor from which most people shrink as they do from that sustained and consecutive thought. It is the hardest work in the world.

contents.item: Never settle... go after your dreams aggressively. Ignore the doubters, step over them. Stay focus on your prize.

contents.item: What I must do is all that concerns me,
contents.owner: Ralph Waldo Emerson, Self-Reliance and Other Essays

contents.item: You won't write, won't ya??I just focus on the negative!

If you focus your mind on “not wanting” something, you are giving energy to and manifesting the thing you do not want. If you worry or fixate on a problem, you are channeling energy to maintain the problem. Focus thoughts and beliefs on the solution, and do not fixate on the problem.
contents.owner: Russell Anthony Gibbs, The Six Principles of Enlightenment and Meaning of Life

contents.item: Focus your heart-felt intuition onto things that really matter to you.

contents.item: Focus your intuitive thoughts to identify what is truly worth pursuing.
contents.owner: Steven Redhead, Unleash The Power of Your Heart and Mind

contents.item: It is what you pursue that gains focus in your life.
contents.owner: Steven Redhead, Unleash The Power of Your Heart and Mind

contents.item: One of the great challenges of our age, in which the tools of our productivity are also the tools of our leisure, is to figure out how to make more useful those moments of procrastination when we’re idling in front of our computer screens.
Secret to Productivity is single tasking: Focus only on one task at hand. And don't start another till that one is completely done
contents.owner: Vivek Naik, Get More Done Easily: Time Management Mindsets and Simple Exercise to Organize Your Day and be More Productive in 5 Days
